data.name: Biters & Bullets
data.detailed_description:
Biters & Bullets is an auto-attacking rogue-lite action game.
You will battle against hordes of zombies, acquire experience to level up and make strategic choices to become stronger than your enemies. Heavily inspired by great rogue-likes such as Vampire Survivors, Magic Survival and Risk of Rain.

Features


  • 16+ Weapons
  • 35+ Powerups
  • 3 Large maps
  • 3 Bosses

Permanent Progression
Earn cash in your runs and spend them in the Lobby. You can unlock primary weapons and characters that offer a variety of gameplay experiences. Upgrade the characters and find the one that best fits your playstyle.



Boss fights
Who doesn’t love boss fights? At the end of every level you will encounter a boss with their own unique mechanics that require fast footwork and an ample amount of firepower.



Super power-ups
Explore the city, and if you’re lucky you might find super power-ups! What the heck is in that mutagen sample?

data.short_description: Kill thousands of zombies, collect loot, and become a lean mean killing machine! Battle and survive hordes of monsters in this high octane casual game with rogue-lite elements. Defeat bosses, hot-wire cars and stack power-ups to infinity. How long will you survive?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-6100 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 580 / AMD HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 680 / AMD HD 7970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains a wide arsenal of weaponry that shoot/maim/assault zombies. There is also ragdoll physics where zombies go flying and a lot of blood.
